Outriders Flight was a light crossbow created to be used by halfling cavalry in Faer√ªn.
The crossbow possessed a +2 enchantment and magically improved the wielders dexterity.
Outriders Flight was created sometime before the  by halfling champions known as outriders. The elite hin cavalry was celebrated defenders of their kin, and Outriders Flight was specifically designed for mounted use. Despite its diminutive appearance, the crossbow packed a wallop. In 1374 DR, Outriders Flight found its way to the Eyegouger Approach and was in the hands of orcish archers there until it was liberated by Kalach-Cha and their companions.
